translations: 柱子；柱状物；台柱（pillar 的复数）
用柱支持（pillar 的第三人称单数）

phrs.translation: ◎(无目的地)从一处到另一处；东奔西跑

sentences.sentence: Mills have iron pillars all over the place holding up the roof.
sentences.translation: 工厂里到处都有铁柱子支撑着屋顶。

sentences.sentence: The pillars sustain the roof of the pit.
There are two pillars at the front of the shop house.
